name: Ooga
description:
A Caveman and his Spear.

You play as Ooga, a caveman living a normal life. A fairy comes and warns him of a great danger, a time machine has arrived. Ooga's one and only weapon is his spear, he can throw it into a wall and use it as a platform, and he can ride it through the air like a majestic bird. Challenge your platforming skills and problem solving in this puzzle based rage platformer!
